channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus International -- Micro Focus - Service Manager Automation (SMA)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus International -- Micro Focus - Service Manager Automation (SMA)

item.title: CVE-2020-9521|2024-08-04T10:34:38.230Z -- micro%20focus%20international -- micro%20focus%20-%20service%20manager%20automation%20%28sma%29
item.description: An SQL injection vulnerability was discovered in Micro Focus Service Manager Automation (SMA), affecting versions 2019.08, 2019.05, 2019.02, 2018.08, 2018.05, 2018.02. The vulnerability could allow for the improper neutralization of special elements in SQL commands and may lead to the product being vulnerable to SQL injection.
